query: When was my last depression screening using the Patient Health Questionnaire Two-Item score completed?
resource_summaries:
This record documents a completed depression screening procedure using the Patient Health Questionnaire Two-Item score on a patient during an encounter with a primary care provider on September 2, 2020.
This record documents a completed depression screening procedure using the Patient Health Questionnaire Two-Item score on a patient during an encounter with their primary care provider on August 16, 2017.
answer: Based on your medical record, your last depression screening using the Patient Health Questionnaire Two-Item score was completed on September 2, 2020.
